title: To the Lighthouse - can be inferred that Charles

content.prompt: It can be inferred from the first sentence that Charles Tansley

choices.label: is a sophisticated man of the world
is sensitive to the way other people treat him
is a person of rather shallow intellect

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
